text: "Safe in the Arms of Love" is a 1986 written by Gail Davies and originally recorded by Wild Choir and failed to chart. It was covered by Baillie & the Boys in 1989 for their album Turn the Tide, Michelle Wright for her fourth studio album The Reasons Why in 1994 and Martina McBride for her third studio album Wild Angels in 1995. title: Safe in the Arms of Love
